content: boyfriend set by stephanie boomsma boyfriend set the boyfriend set is the perfect hat and scarf combo for colder days since mistake rib stitch results in a dense rugged texture this pattern will look just as good on the man in your life as it does on you the extra long scarf is thick and cosy and the hat has a folded over edge for extra warmth you could also leave the hat unfolded which results in a slouchy beanie materials skill level yarn advanced beginner malabrigo rios yarn or an alternative worsted weight yarn required skills include casting on knitting purling decreas- of similar composition the following yardage is required ing stitches magic loop hat 1 skein / 210 yards 192 meters scarf 4 skeins / 840 yards 768 meters technical notes needles 32 circular needle needle suggested size 4 mm us 6 the hat is worked circularly from the bottom up the scarf is worked flat unless otherwise stated always slip 1 knitwise additional tools 1 stitch marker tapestry needle abbreviations gauge sl - slip_stitch k2tog - knit two stitches together psso - pass slipped stitch over 28 stitches = approximately 4 inches rib unstretched pm - place marker sm - slip marker sizes one size fits most adults hat length 11 inches 28 cm with edge unfolded scarf length 70 inches 178 cm special techniques mistake rib stitch pattern - flat round 1 sl1 *k1 p2 k1 repeat from * until 2 stitches re- main k1 p1 mistake rib stitch pattern - round round 1 *k2 p2 repeat from * until end of round round 2 *k1 p2 k1 repeat from * until end of round www formakers com 2 all images text and illustration © for makers 2016 boyfriend set hat pattern cast on 96 sts using the long tail method pm and join in the round sm each time you reach it from now on main body work the mistake rib stitch pattern for working in the round until the piece measures approximately 11 inches 28 cm crown round 1 *sl1 k2tog psso repeat from * until the end of the round 32 stitches remain round 2 *k2tog repeat from * until the end of the round 16 sts remain finishing cut yarn leaving a 10 inch tail using the tapestry needle thread the tail through the remaining stitches twice pull yarn through to the inside of the hat tightly weave in the tail from the crown of the hat and the cast on tail from the brim of the hat fold the edge of the hat up 2 5 inches scarf pattern cast on 71 sts using the long tail method main body work the mistake rib stitch pattern for working flat repeat until the piece measures 70 inches 178 cm from the cast on edge finishing bind off loosely in stitch pattern weave in the ends www formakers com 3 all images text and illustration © for makers 2016
